electionNotActive: Election is not currently active. Voting is only allowed during the active election period.
candidateNotFound: The specified candidate was not found.
alreadyVoted: You have already cast your vote. Each voter can only vote once.
voteFailed: Failed to cast vote. Please try again.
authRequired: Authentication required. Please log in to vote.
tokenExpired: Authentication token has expired. Please log in again.
